Are you using a 32 bit Windows, or did you download the 32 bit version of Geth?

Closing as not enough information. Please check Geth 1.6.0 and if the issue still persist, please provide architectural infos (i.e. 32 or 64 bit geth). If 32 bit, please don't use a 1GB cache, as a 32 bit process can address a maximum of 2GB memory, and Go usually uses twice as large address space as it has "live" objects. So a 1GB allowance will periodically go over 2GB top memory use.
